summary.span: 封装可以对其进行身份验证的主体所通用的帐户和联系人数据。

span.span: Encapsulates the account and contact data common to principals that can be authenticated.

span.span: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生的类构造函数初始化基类调用此构造函数。Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[主体扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概述主题。For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的 ，用于指定帐户过期的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

value.span: 一个 ，用于指定帐户过期的日期和时间；如果帐户永远不过期，则为 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正如所有中的属性，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用方法将返回对象。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object. 当你将设置，时间将默认为 UTC。When you set the , the time will default to UTC. 如果你想要编写本地时间，然后指定属性你对象作为。If you want to write in local time, then specify the property of your object as .

exception.span: 基础存储不支持此属性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

summary.span: 获取一个可以为 null 的 ，用于指定帐户被锁定的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

value.span: 一个 ，用于指定帐户被锁定的日期和时间；如果帐户上未设置锁定时间，则为 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帐户锁定时间取决于系统，并不能通过帐户管理 API 设置。The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API. 若要解锁帐户，使用方法。To unlock the account, use the method. 可以帐户可能不会被锁定时返回一个非 null 值。It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the returns a non-null value. 应用程序应使用方法来确定该帐户锁定。Applications should use the method to determine whether the account is locked out. 正如所有中的属性，时间返回采用 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要将其转换为本地时间，调用方法将返回对象。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object.

exception.span: 基础存储不支持此属性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个可以为 null 的布尔值，该值指定是否支持此帐户进行身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

value.span: 如果启用主体，则为 （如果未保持该帐户，则为 null）；否则为 。

span.span: if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不将该主体保持在存储区中，此属性将返回 null。If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null. 保持主体后，默认启用设置取决于存储区。After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store. AD DS 和 AD LDS 存储禁用新的主体时将它们永久保存，而 SAM 使新的主体时将它们永久保存。The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted. 应用程序仅可以将此属性设置为一个值后已持久化的存储中。The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.

exception.span: 基础存储不支持此属性。

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

exception.span: 应用程序尝试为此属性设置 Null 值。

span.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

summary.span: 使此帐户的密码过期。

span.span: Expires the password for this account.

summary.span: 这会强制用户在下次登录时更改其密码。

span.span: This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以强制用户在下次登录时更改密码。Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.

exception.span: 将更改保存到存储区时发生异常。

span.span: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.
